addr: 11440 San Vicente Blvd Los Angeles, CA 90049
title: Architects of Change Conversation: Maria Shriver & Katherine Woodward Thomas, author "Conscious Uncoupling"
desc: Join Architect of Change Katherine Woodward Thomas, the blockbuster bestselling author of "Conscious Uncoupling" which has captured the attention of anyone looking for a thoughtful break from any relationship. Thomas joins award-winning journalist, Maria Shriver in intimate conversation and asks everyone in the audience to leave inspired and changed.
